channel.title: Swats Emote System To Bluurs Cleint? HELP!
channel.description:
Hello all, I am a bit late on adding swats emote system, But I dont wanna make a whole new client just for a couple skillcape emotes and drag claws emote, anyways I got 14 errors when adding swats emote system, maybe someone can help me!
Please and thank you Regards dhfhy1
[code=java]Class20.java:8: class, interface, or enum expected public static int FrameStart[] = new int[2000]; ^ Class20.java:13: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: ')' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: <identifier> expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: ';' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: > expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: '(' expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: <identifier> expected for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:13: illegal start of type for(int j = 0; j < FrameStart.length; j++) ^ Class20.java:14: ']' expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:14: illegal start of type FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:14: <identifier> expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ Class20.java:14: ';' expected FrameStart[j] = 0; ^ 14 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
